participant_1.background:
I have no pets because I spend most of my time at work or at the bar.
I'm originally from a small town in the Midwest, but I've been living in the city for a few years now.
i ve studied ballet all my life.
I am a pet owner and I love my pet iguana.
School is going well, but I'm looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies.

i like to try different beers from various countries.
I'm of mixed race, but I identify more with my Chinese heritage.
I have a weekly laundry routine to keep up with my kids' dirty clothes.
i am a vegetarian but i eat fish , especially sushi.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you! How about yourself?
I'm doing well too. I'm originally from a small town in the Midwest, but I've been living in the city for a few years now.
That's cool! I'm from a small town in the Midwest too. What do you like about living in the city?
I like the convenience of being able to walk to everything, and I also like the diversity of the people.
Yeah, I can see how that would be nice. I'm a little more of a homebody, so I like the peace and quiet of the suburbs.
I understand that. I like to go out and explore the city, but I also like to relax at home.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the ballet, I'm a huge fan! I also like to try different beers from various countries.
That's cool! I've never been to the ballet, but I've always wanted to go. I love trying different beers too. Do you have a favorite brewery?
I don't have a favorite brewery, but I really like the beers from Belgium.
I've never had a beer from Belgium, but I'll have to try one sometime.
